message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled benefits. Considering its unique features and the value it brings, I am extending an exclusive offer to you today. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special price of $2000000?
I'm very interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
